content.rendered:
The Stanwick Picnic Table is made from treated Spruce Wood and a 55mm parasol hole in the middle of the table. Impregnated with a high quality wood preserver.

This product benefits from:

– 38 & 30mm timber slats

– Extremely robust construction

– Smooth timber slats for ultimate comfort

– Environmentally friendly pressure treated timber

– Galvanised metal fixings

– Rounded corners and edges for added safety

– Parasol Hole and room for a parasol base

These items are best assembled upside-down. 1 year guarantee.

Table top diameter is 1100mm.

The clearance from the bottom of the cross frame and the floor is 310mm – therefore a standard parasol base will not fit under the cross fame. We suggest using a fixed parasol support and attaching this to the wooden frame of the picnic table for support.
